title: SnapAMeal
description: An innovative food tracking application that uses computer vision to instantly analyze meals and provide nutritional information.
fullDescription: SnapAMeal revolutionizes nutritional tracking for busy college students. Developed during Week 2 of the Gauntlet AI program, this app uses advanced computer vision and machine learning to identify food items from photos and calculate detailed nutritional information. Simply snap a photo of your meal, and SnapAMeal provides instant analysis of calories, macronutrients, vitamins, and minerals. The app maintains a comprehensive meal history, tracks nutritional trends over time, and offers personalized dietary recommendations based on your goals.
